string-table.video-title:
Watch this video to learn how NFTE alum Angela Ivana used creativity and innovation to become a successful entrepreneur.
Click on the hotspots as they appear to learn more about Angela’s use of this skill.

string-table.s1scene1Title: Create and Innovate by Challenging the Usual
string-table.scenarioDesc: Explore these three scenarios to find out how entrepreneurs use creativity and innovation by 'challenging the usual,' creating idea maps, and using brainstorming techniques.
string-table.s1scene1Point1Text: I want to change how I play video games.
string-table.s1scene1Point2Text: Game systems can be home consoles or portable devices.
string-table.s1scene1Point3Text: Game systems don’t HAVE to be console-only or portable device-only.
string-table.s1scene1Point4Text: What if my game system could convert between a portable system and a console system? How could I make that work?

question.text:
How do you feel about this statement?
A creative and innovative mindset could help a person still succeed despite an economic downturn.
Do you think Angela Ivana could relate to the makeup professionals’ problems?

options.feedback: Angela Ivana had a similar experience. Entrepreneurs often use creativity and innovation to solve problems they relate to.
Angela Ivana had a similar experience. Entrepreneurs often use creativity and innovation to solve problems they relate to.

question.text: How did Angela Ivana use a creativity and innovation mindset?

options.option: By creating a new brand of makeup for beauty professionals.
options.feedback: Angela Ivana 'challenged the usual' to improve an outdated education system.

options.option: By challenging assumptions about beauty school education.
options.feedback: Angela Ivana 'challenged the usual' to improve an outdated education system.

questions.text: Many successful entrepreneurs find it personally rewarding to use creativity and innovation to improve how things are done in the world.

scenarios.description: Demonstrate creativity and innovation by 'challenging the usual.'
scenarios.scenarioDesc: Watch this video to learn about how an entrepreneurial mindset can be used to grow an already successful industry.
scenarios.title: Scenario 1

question.text: How did each of these successful innovations challenge the usual?

options.option: What if I could stay at someone's home instead of a hotel when I travel?
What if I could do my banking from locations outside of the bank?
What if books could be stored and read on a portable device?
What if I didn’t have to wear sunscreen under my clothing?

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! You have matched each innovation to the question that would have challenged the usual before the innovation. E-readers challenged the usual of paper books. UPF Protective Swimwear challenged the usual of having to wear sunscreen to protect covered skin. ATMs challenged the usual of banking services only being provided inside of a bank. AirBnB Rental Service challenged the usual of travelers having to stay in and pay for hotels.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Try again. Think about what type of product would fill the need described by each question.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Try again. Think about what type of product would fill the need described by each question.

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! You have matched each innovation to the question that would have challenged the usual before the innovation. E-readers challenged the usual of paper books. UPF Protective Swimwear challenged the usual of having to wear sunscreen to protect covered skin. ATMs challenged the usual of banking services only being provided inside of a bank. AirBnB Rental Service challenged the usual of travelers having to stay in and pay for hotels.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: E-readers challenged the usual of paper books. UPF Protective Swimwear challenged the usual of having to wear sunscreen to protect covered skin. ATMs challenged the usual of banking services only being provided inside of a bank. AirBnB Rental Service challenged the usual of travelers having to stay in and pay for hotels.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: E-readers challenged the usual of paper books. UPF Protective Swimwear challenged the usual of having to wear sunscreen to protect covered skin. ATMs challenged the usual of banking services only being provided inside of a bank. AirBnB Rental Service challenged the usual of travelers having to stay in and pay for hotels.

scenarios.description: Generate innovative ideas by using idea maps for creative thinking.
scenarios.scenarioDesc: Watch this video to learn about how a successful industry has the potential to keep growing if entrepreneurs apply the mindset of creativity and innovation.
scenarios.title: Scenario 2

scenes.instructionScenario: Select each circle on the idea map to see how an entrepreneur might organize solutions to these problems to create an innovative product.
scenes.title: Use Idea Maps for Creative Thinking

column1.title: Problems
points: Display is hard to view in daylight
Touch screen does not respond to sweaty fingertips
New algorithm to calculate calorie usage

question.text:
Create an idea map of your own to organize solutions to common problems with headphones.
Drag each word or phrase to the correct box, and select Submit.

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! You have matched each idea to the problem it addresses. Foldable or flexible headphones could improve portability, noise cancelling or tight-fitting headphones could reduce background noise, and reinforced connections and different materials could improve durability.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Foldable or flexible headphones could improve portability, noise cancelling or tight-fitting headphones could reduce background noise, and reinforced connections and different materials could improve durability.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Try again. Each idea relates to a specific problem with current models of headphones.

feedbackObj.correct: Foldable or flexible headphones could improve portability, noise cancelling or tight-fitting headphones could reduce background noise, and reinforced connections and different materials could improve durability.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Foldable or flexible headphones could improve portability, noise cancelling or tight-fitting headphones could reduce background noise, and reinforced connections and different materials could improve durability.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Foldable or flexible headphones could improve portability, noise cancelling or tight-fitting headphones could reduce background noise, and reinforced connections and different materials could improve durability.

question.text:
Create an idea map of your own to organize solutions to common problems with headphones.

feedbackObj.inCorrect: Solve a problem that stems from customer pain points and create a new product that solves the problem.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Solve a problem that stems from customer pain points and create a new product that solves the problem.

and potential

question.text: How do idea maps help facilitate the entrepreneurial mindset of creativity and innovation?

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! Idea maps are an effective way to organize information. By clearly organizing problems and solutions, an entrepreneur can more easily brainstorm innovations to solve the problems.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Incorrect. Idea maps are an effective way to organize information. By clearly organizing problems and solutions, an entrepreneur can more easily brainstorm innovations to solve the problems.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: You can use an idea map to organize ideas around a central theme and identify potential areas for innovation based on problems with current products.

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! Idea maps are an effective way to organize information. By clearly organizing problems and solutions, an entrepreneur can more easily brainstorm innovations to solve the problems.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Incorrect. Idea maps are an effective way to organize information. By clearly organizing problems and solutions, an entrepreneur can more easily brainstorm innovations to solve the problems.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: You can use an idea map to organize ideas around a central theme and identify potential areas for innovation based on problems with current products.

scenarios.description: Use brainstorming techniques to enhance creativity and innovation.
scenarios.scenarioDesc: Watch this video to learn about how brainstorming with the creativity and innovation mindset resulted in the creation of a hugely successful product.
scenarios.title: Scenario 3

scenes.question: What are the possible uses for repositionable adhesive?
What are the possible uses for repositionable adhesive?

question.text:
What are the best practices used in successful brainstorming?
Drag each idea to the correct column, then select Submit.

options.option: Think of as many ideas as possible

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! Brainstorming is more likely to succeed when participants extend other’s ideas, encourage wild ideas, include a diverse group, and think of as many ideas as possible. Following a rigid structure and criticizing others’ ideas can limit creativity when brainstorming.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Try again. Think about which behaviors would best foster creativity.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Try again. Think about which behaviors would best foster creativity.

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! Brainstorming is more likely to succeed when participants extend other’s ideas, encourage wild ideas, include a diverse group, and think of as many ideas as possible. Following a rigid structure and criticizing others’ ideas can limit creativity when brainstorming.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Brainstorming is more likely to succeed when participants extend other’s ideas, encourage wild ideas, include a diverse group, and think of as many ideas as possible. Following a rigid structure and criticizing others’ ideas can limit creativity when brainstorming.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Brainstorming is more likely to succeed when participants extend other’s ideas, encourage wild ideas, include a diverse group, and think of as many ideas as possible. Following a rigid structure and criticizing others’ ideas can limit creativity when brainstorming.

scenes.inlineText:
When you brainstorm, you list as many possible
as quickly as possible. Some of these ideas might seem
, but they might turn out to be innovative ideas.

question.text:
How does brainstorming facilitate the entrepreneurial mindset of creativity and innovation?
Drag and drop the words or phrases into the statement and select Submit.

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! Brainstorming should be a free flow of ideas that could be the solution to a problem. All ideas should be included, no matter how ridiculous they might seem.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Brainstorming should be a free flow of ideas that could be the solution to a problem. All ideas should be included, no matter how ridiculous they might seem.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Brainstorming should be a free flow of ideas that could be the answer to a question. All ideas should be included, no matter how ridiculous they might seem.

feedbackObj.correct: Correct! Brainstorming should be a free flow of ideas that could be the solution to a problem. All ideas should be included, no matter how ridiculous they might seem.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Brainstorming should be a free flow of ideas that could be the solution to a problem. All ideas should be included, no matter how ridiculous they might seem.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Brainstorming should be a free flow of ideas that could be the answer to a question. All ideas should be included, no matter how ridiculous they might seem.

question.text: Which of the following best describes creativity?

options.feedback: Incorrect. Asking questions is part of the creative process, but developing innovative ideas based on the answers to these questions is creativity.
Incorrect. Identifying problems is part of the creative process, but developing innovative ideas to solve these problems is creativity.
Incorrect. Identifying assumptions is part of the creative process, but developing innovative ideas to solve these problems is creativity.
Correct. Creativity is the process of developing ideas.

quiz.inlineText:
The group
discuss each idea as it is suggested.
The group
build upon ideas suggested by its members.
The group
include people with diverse backgrounds and opinions.
The group
be respectful of all ideas.

question.text:
A group of entrepreneurs meets to brainstorm answers to the question, “What are the possible uses for this new technology?”
Drag and drop the phrase that best completes each statement:

feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Nice try! Your answer is partially correct!

question.text: What is an idea map?<div class="bold-weight"> Select all that apply.

options.option: a way to limit ridiculous ideas
a tool for creating a diagram of a town
a visual aid to help find solutions to problems

feedbackObj.correct: Correct. An idea map is many things: a diagram that connects information, a valuable brainstorming tool, and a visual aid to help find solutions to problems.
feedbackObj.inCorrect: Incorrect. An idea map is many things: a diagram that connects information, a valuable brainstorming tool, and a visual aid to help find solutions to problems.
feedbackObj.partiallyCorrect: Partially Correct. An idea map is many things: a diagram that connects information, a valuable brainstorming tool, and a visual aid to help find solutions to problems.

quiz.inlineText:
1. I want to change the design of tablet cases.
2.
3. Cases don’t HAVE to trade comfort for protection.

4. What if my tablet cover could provide protection while still being lightweight and sleek?

question.text:
An entrepreneur wants to innovate by improving upon tablet cases. Complete the four steps she can use to challenge the usual.
Drag and drop the statement that best completes Step 2.

options.option: Cases are either fashionable or strong.
options.feedback: Incorrect. The challenge does not involve the appearance of the case.

options.option: Cases are either bulky or protective.
options.feedback: Incorrect. The “what if” question suggests that the entrepreneur assumes that cases are either bulky and uncomfortable or lightweight.

options.option: Cases are either bulky or lightweight.
options.feedback: Correct. The “what if” question suggests that the entrepreneur assumes that cases are either bulky and uncomfortable or lightweight.

question.text:
Self Reflection: Click the part of the scale that best describes how you feel about the following statement:
I understand the domain of creativity and innovation.
